Literature Review: The econometrics of nonlinear budget sets has gained significant attention in recent years, particularly with the development of nonparametric models and methods for estimation of choice models with nonlinear budget sets. This literature review aims to provide an overview of the key concepts, methods, and empirical findings in this area.
